feature_model.name: Music player
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Music player (f_Music_player) :m Player controls (f_Player_controls) :m Play (f_Play) :m Pause (f_Pause) :m Stop (f_Stop) :m Next song (f_Next_song) :m Previous song (f_Previous_song) :g [1, *] : Mp3 (f_Mp3) : Ogg (f_Ogg) : FLAC (f_FLAC) : wav (f_wav) : midi (f_midi) : acc (f_acc)
